aboutSection.title: About WIMESSA
aboutSection.text: The World Islamic and Middle Eastern Studies Student Association brings together students and scholars interested in Islamic and Middle Eastern studies. Learn more about our mission, history, and community.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: WIMESSA brings together students and scholars interested in Islamic and Middle Eastern studies to foster dialogue, support research, and build an inclusive community on campus and beyond.

joinUs.title: Join us
joinUs.text: Interested in Islamic and Middle Eastern studies? Get in touch to join WIMESSA, hear about events, or learn how you can get involved.

maktoub.title: Maktoub
maktoub.aboutText: Maktoub is WIMESSA's annual publication. It is a collection of essays, art, and reflections from our community. Each edition captures a year of ideas and voices in Islamic and Middle Eastern studies.
maktoub.comingSoonGeneric: This Maktoub edition is coming soon.
